participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

socialdev_visit_01.Description: Is this visit being completed on the same day as the ABCD visit  or on a separate day? | 1 = Same day; 2=  Separate day

socialdev_visit_02.Description: Which caregiver is completing today's visit? | 1 = Primary caregiver; 2=  Secondary caregiver

socialdev_visit_03.Description: Has a Change of Caregiver form been filled out for this visit | 1 = Yes; 0=No

socialdev_visit_consent.Description: Did the participants legal guardians give consent for participation in the Social Development SubStudy? | 1 = Yes; 0=No

socialdev_visit_assent.Description: Did the participant assented to participation into the Social Development SubStudy? | 1 = Yes; 0=No

socialdev_visit_date.Description: Visit date for Social Development Sub-Study

socialdev_visit_preport_l___1.Description: Did the guardian consent to allow reporting of sensitive information under the conditions listed on the consent form?1, Yes | 0=No ; 1=Yes

socialdev_visit_novisit_l.Description: If this visit will not be completed, indicate the most appropriate reason, when known: | 1=Can't schedule ; 2=Declined this year ; 3=Opted out of SD only ; 4=Ineligible quit ABCD

socialdev_visit_last_l.Description: Date of LAST SD substudy visit

socialdev_visit_date_l.Description: Visit date for Social Development substudy

socialdev_visit_creport_l___1.Description: Did the child assent to allow reporting of sensitive information under conditions listed on the assent form?1, Yes | 0=No ; 1=Yes

socialdev_visit_consent_l___1.Description: Did the participant's legal guardian give consent for participation in the Social Development substudy?1, Yes | 0=No ; 1=Yes

socialdev_visit_assent_l___1.Description: Did the participant assent to participation into the Social Development substudy?1, Yes | 0=No ; 1=Yes

socialdev_visit_03_l___1.Description: Has a Change of Caregiver form been filled out for this visit?1, Yes | 0=No ; 1=Yes

socialdev_visit_02_l.Description: Which caregiver is completing today's visit? | 1=Primary caregiver ; 2=Secondary caregiver [socialdev_visit_01_l] = '2'

socialdev_visit_01_l.Description: Is this visit being completed on the same day as the ABCD visit, or on a separate day? | 1=Same day ; 2=Separate day
